title: From the Jungle to the Boardroom
description: This book is about leadership and decision-making. In From the Jungle to the Boardroom , author Mike Monahan focuses on the lessons he learned in the jungles of Vietnam and in leading Life Success Seminars, a Cincinnati-based nonprofit organization that empowers people to make positive life changes.Â This book provides insight and challenges you to think about your daily leadership decisions. After all, we're all leaders, 24 hours a day. We lead ourselves, and we lead at home and at work.
author: Mike  Monahan
